readme: Playlist Query Filters (evaluated with selection) using All Music or Last FM tags.

queryFilter.name: Same All Music / Last FM genres than sel
queryFilter.query: (ALBUM GENRE ALLMUSIC IS #ALBUM GENRE ALLMUSIC#) OR (ALBUM GENRE LAST.FM IS #ALBUM GENRE LAST.FM#)

queryFilter.name: Same All Music moods than sel
queryFilter.query: (ALBUM MOOD ALLMUSIC IS #ALBUM MOOD ALLMUSIC#) OR (ALBUM THEME ALLMUSIC IS #ALBUM THEME ALLMUSIC#)
